DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify compatibility silicone hydrogel lens use four multipurpose disinfect solution ( OPTI-FREE® RepleniSH® , ReNu MultiPlus® , Solo-Care Aqua™ MeniCareTM Soft ) .
DOC.brief_title: Multipurpose Disinfecting Solution Compatibility With Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lens
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study verify compatibility silicone hydrogel lens use four multipurpose disinfect solution ( OPTI-FREE® RepleniSH® , ReNu MultiPlus® , Solo-Care Aqua™ MeniCareTM Soft ) observe change within cornea .
DOC.criteria: A person eligible inclusion study he/she : 1 . Is least 17 year old full legal capacity volunteer 2 . Has read sign information consent letter , opportunity ask question receive acceptable answer 3 . Is willing able follow instruction maintain study appointment schedule 4 . Is correctable visual acuity 6/7.5 ( 20/25 ) good ( eye ) habitual vision correction 5 . Has normal binocular vision ( strabismus , amblyopia , anisometropia less equal 1.00 D ) 6 . Has clear cornea active ocular disease 7 . Has ocular examination last two year . 8 . Has functional pair spectacles 9 . Is current soft lens wearer replace lens least monthly 10 . Has distance contact lens prescription +6.00D 10.00 DS successfully fit study lens 11 . Has astigmatism le equal 1.00DC 12 . Agrees wear study lens daily wear basis A person exclude study he/she : 1 . Has sign symptom dry eye 2 . Has clinically significant blepharitis 3 . Has undergone corneal refractive surgery 4 . Is aphakic 5 . Has systemic disease affect ocular health 6 . Is use systemic topical medication may affect ocular health 7 . Is pregnant lactate 8 . Is participate type clinical research study 9 . Currently wear daily disposable lens 10 . Currently wear lenses continuous extend wear basis 11 . Is unable successfully wear contact lenses without routinely use rewetting drop
